page.title: 17THE WORK OF A DISTRICT NURSE
page.content: There are no hospitals or doctors surgeries,but a team of district nurses.One nurse lives locally making it easy for her daily rounds.Her patients are mainly elderly.The nurse is a member of a medical team, including a G.P.,health visitor, midwife,S.R.N.,S.E.N. and a bath nurse .The nurses patients are all long term.A typical day starts at 8.30 when the nurse visits the diabetics to give them their injections,then those needing just general care.The stroke patients come next.Then the nurse attends the doctor's,surgery to take some of the doctor's calls.After the calls she must return to the surgery to record where she has been and to sort out tommorrow's work.She finishes work at 5.00pm.She works a 37\ hour week with a \hour break daily, one weekend each month is free.
